tool_description: The Canadian Bitcoin Index API is the definitive source for Canadian Bitcoin price information. The primary /index endpoint returns a value for the price of a Bitcoin denominated in Canadian dollars calculated as an average from actual trade data from all Canadian owned exchanges.
name: Canadian Bitcoin Index
title: Canadian Bitcoin Index

api_list.name: /index
api_list.description: The Index API provides the latest index values, volume data and change information
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://cbix-v1.p.rapidapi.com/index"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "cbix-v1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:

print(response.json())

api_list.name: /volatility
api_list.description: The Volatility API returns daily historical index volatility data

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: days to limit the historical data returned to

api_list.name: /news
api_list.description: The News API returns the latest news feed curated by CBIX

api_list.name: /summary
api_list.description: The Summary API returns the latest index and market summary including market capitalization, total coins in circulation and 52-week high and lows
api_list.code:

url = "https://cbix-v1.p.rapidapi.com/summary"

headers = {

api_list.name: /history
api_list.description: The History API returns daily index values and change information from 2011-09-01

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: days to limit the historical data returned to

api_list.name: /orderbook
api_list.description: The Order Book API returns a full order book for all supported exchanges

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: number of orders to limit the results to

api_list.name: /convert
api_list.description: The Convert API processes a simple currency conversion between BTC and CAD based on the current index price

optional_parameters.name: from
optional_parameters.description: The currency to be converted from

optional_parameters.name: to
optional_parameters.description: The currency to be converted to
